movieHistory.title: Movie History
movieHistory.description: Application that tracks movies you've watched and want to watch
movieHistory.technologiesUsed: html, scss and javascript, modular javascript, axios, XMLhttprequest Promises, firebase CRUD

doggieDaycare.title: Doggie Daycare
doggieDaycare.description: This application assists in organizing a dog daycare
doggieDaycare.technologiesUsed: HTML, SCSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, modular javascript, axios, XMLhttprequest Promises, firebase CRUD, React

tamagotchi.title: Tamagotchi
tamagotchi.description: This app is a virtual Tamagotchi game! Each section has two buttons with add and subtract elements of the Tamagotchi. The values increase and decrease by random increments, and the Eat, Sleep, and Fight modules are interactive. Additionally there's an input field at the bottom to upload a picture of your Tamagotchi!
tamagotchi.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Modular Javascript, Version Control with Github

fishStore.title: Fish Store
fishStore.description: Fish Store is an online fish market where users can add fish to their order, submit that order, and then edit or delete an order if they wish
fishStore.technologiesUsed: HTML, SCSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, modular javascript, axios, XMLhttprequest Promises, firebase CRUD, React
